name: 江謝令涵
objective:
本課程介紹統計學、計量經濟學之基本概念，旨在培養學生理解數據、進而分析數據能力。課程理論與實務並重，採理論講授、上機實作交替方式進行，確保學生在實務上應用統計理論之能力。透過修習本課程，學生可將統計概念應用於自然科學領域之實驗數據整理，或社會科學領域之巨量資料分析，培養具備跨領域問題分析能力之學生。
This course aims to develop the ability to understand and analyze environmental problems through the basic concept of statistics and econometrics. Both lectures regarding theories and practical lessons on computer are included in this course to make sure students’ ability of application in the future. Skills taught in this course can be applied in both natural science and social science, thus enhancing students’ interdisciplinary potential.
schedule:
1. Introduction of software
2. Preparation of software environment
3. Basic statistics
4. F-test
5. F-test practice
6. Hypothesis and OLS
7. Univariate OLS
8. Univariate OLS practice
9. Multivariate regression 
10. Regression practice
11. Proxy variable
12. Proxy variable practice
13. Instrumental Variable (IV) estimation
14. IV practice
15. Panel data
16. Panel data practice
17. Examination
